text.div:
Generated Narrative: ValueSet v3-RoleClassMutualRelationship

Language: en

This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Include codes fromhttp://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-RoleClass where concept is-a _RoleClassMutualRelationship

This value set excludes codes based on the following rules:

  • Exclude these codes as defined in http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-RoleClass
    CodeDisplayDefinition
    _RoleClassMutualRelationshipRoleClassMutualRelationshipA relationship that is based on mutual behavior of the two Entities as being related. The basis of such relationship may be agreements (e.g., spouses, contract parties) or they may be *de facto* behavior (e.g. friends) or may be an incidental involvement with each other (e.g. parties over a dispute, siblings, children).

name: RoleClassMutualRelationship
title: RoleClassMutualRelationship
description: A relationship that is based on mutual behavior of the two Entities as being related. The basis of such relationship may be agreements (e.g., spouses, contract parties) or they may be *de facto* behavior (e.g. friends) or may be an incidental involvement with each other (e.g. parties over a dispute, siblings, children).
